data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the church of Masbate, Philippines that they are blessed with every heavenly blessing.
data.verse: Blessed be the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, who has blessed us with every spiritual blessing in the heavenly places in Christ

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Masbate, Philippines
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage every believer in Masbate, Philippines to do the work of an evangelist with their friends and neighbors.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist

data.prayer: Father, please raise up every one you have called in Masbate, Philippines to become worthy of their calling, and offer spiritual sacrifices acceptable to you through Jesus.
data.verse: I urge you to live a life worthy of the calling you have received

data.prayer: Spirit, give faith and responsive hearts to the 841,000 citizens of the the state of Masbate.
data.verse: Seek the Lord while he may be found; call upon him while he is near.

data.prayer: Jesus, help the local leaders in Masbate, Philippines not be proud but humble, and willing to wash the feet of all they serve.
data.verse: “You call me ‘Teacher’ and ‘Lord,’ and rightly so, for that is what I am. Now that I, your Lord and Teacher, have washed your feet, you also should wash one another’s feet. I have set you an example that you should do as I have done for you.

data.prayer: Father, remind your church in Masbate, Philippines that you have set your Son over all rule and authority, power and dominion, and every name that is invoked.
data.verse: he raised Christ from the dead and seated him at his right hand in the heavenly realms, far above all rule and authority, power and dominion, and every name that is invoked, not only in the present age but also in the one to come.

data.prayer: Please, teach the 117,150 believers in Masbate, Philippines how to pray to you and how to listen for your voice. That they might follow you into the good works you have prepared for them.
data.verse: My sheep listen to my voice; I know them, and they follow me.

location.name: Masbate
location.cities_list: Masbate, Cataingan, San Jacinto, San Fernando, Claveria
location.cities_list_w_pop: Masbate (47,490), Cataingan (7,809), San Jacinto (7,637), San Fernando (6,211), Claveria (6,185)
